pullRequest.title: Fix test timeout for health on master failover
pullRequest.bodyText:
testHealthOnMasterFailover could timeout on some of the health requests
in the case where an index is added, since the recovery leads to
extended test run time.
Relates #61709
Closes #62690

commit.message:
Fix test timeout for health on master failover

testHealthOnMasterFailover could timeout on some of the health requests
in the case where an index is added, since the recovery leads to
extended test run time.

Closes #62690

nodes.bodyText: Just for my understanding: We took more than 1 minute here to get 20 (empty) shards to recover? Isn't that indicative of some other issue?
